name: Upgraded Aeropack
tooltip:
Upgraded Aeropack

Cost: 3200
+20 Ability Haste
+110 Ability Power
+350 Health

UNIQUE Passive: Empowers your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.

UNIQUE Active - Supersonic: Dash in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of rockets that deal 175 - 250 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Then, gain 50% bonus movement speed toward enemy champions for 2 seconds (40 second cooldown). Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
